page.title: 07Village Shop
page.content: Peldon has only one village shop which supplies the villagers with many of their needs. This is essential as Colchester is some 10 miles away, and though there is a bus service, it is not frequent. The shop sells fresh bread and vegetables, many grown locally. There is also an extensive range of hardware such as nails, screws and glues etc, as well as tools and equipment. As with many such village shops, it is a family concern and forms a large part of village life besides the church and the Plough Inn.
